Natural disasters: While this may not be an ideal sight, I would want to see the natural disasters that will occur in the future so that we can prepare and take necessary precautions.
Global events: I would want to see major global events that will shape the world's future, such as political elections, economic shifts, and international conflicts.
Personal events: I would want to see the events that will affect my own life, such as my own future achievements and the happiness of my loved ones.
The fate of humanity: I would want to see the overall fate of humanity, including our ability to overcome challenges and our potential for growth and progress.
The fate of the Earth: I would want to see the environmental changes that will affect our planet and the actions we take to mitigate them.
